definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Nowadays，it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers of sailors.
sentences.chinese: 今天，鞭笞抗命士兵或水手是不人道的惩罚。

sentences.english: We seldom have a holiday. It is out of humanity to make up the fucuking missed lessons.
sentences.chinese: 难得放假，却让我们补课补得死去活来，真不人道。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 先进，鞭笞不服从的兵士或水手是不人道的惩罚。

sentences.english: How can she come with such non-humanitarian words?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能说出如此不人道的话？
但这样不人道，而且残忍。

sentences.english: You should be abashed to commit such immoral crime.
sentences.chinese: 你应该为你所犯下的不人道罪刑感到惭愧。

sentences.english: Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 现今，鞭苔不服从的兵士或水手是不人道的惩罚。

sentences.english: Nowadays, it is an inpeoplee punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers ofsailors.
sentences.chinese: 当今，鞭笞抗命士兵或水手是不人道的惩罚。

sentences.english: It’s in the daily examples of man’s inhumanity to man.
sentences.chinese: 每天都有人类以不人道的方式对待他人的例子。

sentences.english: Boxing is the single most inhuman sport,which only humans can invent.
sentences.chinese: 拳击是最不人道的运动，然而只有人能够发明。

sentences.english: It is in the daily example of man's inhumanity to man.
sentences.chinese: 每天都有人会对其他的人做出不人道的事来。

sentences.english: Shades of Blade Runner's inhuman pyramids I'm afraid.
sentences.chinese: 《银翼杀手》阴影下的不人道的金字塔，恕我直言。

definition: to be lacking in moral sense/to lack common basic respect for others/lacking in virtue/mischievous/wicked/cruel/mean
to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial
